lead_paragraph: Marathon negotiations lead to a new round of much-needed funding and pledges for debt relief, with conditions.

headline.print_headline: E.U. Ministers Agree to Another Lifeline for Greece
headline.main: Eurozone Agrees to Debt Relief and Bailout Aid for Greece

snippet: Marathon negotiations lead to a new round of much-needed funding and pledges for debt relief, with conditions.
abstract: Greece wins more pledges of debt relief, with policy makers rushing to arrange deal amid fears of renewed crisis that could have global economic impact; eurozone finance ministers also agree to new round of aid for country.
